entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Auto insert for a related entity may insert duplicated rows with a `one-to-one` relationship #30236
  • The path params of EF.Functions.JsonExtract cannot use variable. #30235
  • Sum throwing exception when property has a ValueConverter with ConvertsNulls set to true #30233
  • Add expression support for abstract properties #30232
  • Unexpected `RenameIndex` added to EF Core migration after upgrading from EF Core 3.1 to EF Core 6 #30231
  • EF Core Throwing Exception with Successfully Inserting Record #30230
  • Unable to Add code first migration #30229
  • IComparable/IEquatable could not be translated #30228
  • EF incorrectly generates INNER JOIN (instead of LEFT JOIN) on optional FK with explicit fluent configuration #30227

Closed

  • Value comparer out of memory #30194
  • ExecuteSqlRaw(string) fails with FormatException 'Input string was not in a correct format.' #30188
  • RelationalConnectionDependencies depending on IRelationalCommandBuilderFactory #30187
  • Support some form of dependency injection to parameterize a `Migration` #30141
  • Include() ignored when using GroupBy entity type #30138
  • ExecuteUpdateAsync in EF Core: set property based on Logic throws InvalidOperation Exception #30119
  • IndexOutOfRangeException in CreateNavigationExpansionExpression(Expression sourceExpression, IEntityType entityType) / get_Chars(Int32 index) when EF class named "<>f__AnonymousType01Child" in 7.0.2 version #30115
  • context.Update causes DELETE instead of UPDATE #30102
  • Wrong SQL translating from LINQ to SQL looking for all users that have all the specified claims. #30005
  • Migration bundle only executes code in `Development` mode #29951

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't set table names from DbSet properties when Discriminator property is conflicted with the default but is then configured explicitly #30234

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #30226
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • Mark bundle Program.cs as auto-generated #30210
